function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High risk of viral spreading within households due to close contact","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus leading to higher infection rates and strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene protocols within households and provide support for infected individuals to isolate effectively","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and home testing kits","People":"Household members, especially those living with infected individuals","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Economic impact on industry due to inability of A1 agents to generate wealth","Impact":"Decreased GDP, business losses, and labor income reduction","Mitigation":"Implement economic countermeasures such as tax exemptions and universal income to minimize wealth losses","Technologies":"Economic stimulus packages and financial support programs","People":"Business owners, employees, and government authorities","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Mental health and well-being of individuals due to prolonged social isolation","Impact":"Increased risk of anxiety, depression, and other mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support services, promote virtual social interactions, and encourage physical activity within lockdown restrictions","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, online counseling services, and virtual community engagement tools","People":"General population, especially those living alone or in vulnerable situations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"}]}
